akn:section.akn:heading: Embedded mental health providers of the reserve components: display of budget information

akn:content.akn:p: § 237. Embedded mental health providers of the reserve components: display of budget information The Secretary of Defense shall submit to Congress, as a part of the documentation that supports the President’s annual budget for the Department of Defense, a budget justification display with respect to embedded mental health providers within each reserve component, including the amount requested for each such component. (Added Pub. L. 113–66, div. A, title VII, § 721(a), Dec. 26, 2013, 127 Stat. 799.)
